text: 16.19 Mat 10.16, Lom 1.8, 1 Ko 14.20 Nɨbi God takaw ne ak dɨtep gɨl kɨdek gɨpɨm ak, binɨb okok mɨdupsek nɨbi gɨpɨm ak nepal. Anɨb ak tek nɨbi anɨgɨpɨm ak gos nɨgen, yɨp tep yɨbɨl gup. Yad pen anɨgɨl gos nepin, nɨbi tap gɨtep gep ak nɨgtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨmɨb, tap gɨ tɨmel gep ak olap gos ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb.
